mapper.select: select review_num, review_title, review_content, score, review_date, user_id, tour_num from reviews where review_exporsure = 'Y' order by review_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into reviews(review_num, review_title, review_content, score, review_date, user_id, tour_num) values(review_num_seq.nextval, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{score}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{userId}, #{tourNum})
